Articles.Content: Sorry if this is known, but it just came up on [reddit](http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/2zl1pt/error_with_ksp_home_page_i_couldnt_login_and/); The store seems to be a bit broken right now, I can log in but if I click on anything it logs me out again.
I have just experienced the same issue, but the store is now letting me access my account page.
Cool, looks like it's fixed! I can get back in now too. nice1!
